metadata.description: A luxury cruise ship crashed on Ythaq, a planet that is curiously listed nowhere. Among those shipwrecked were, the beautiful and intrepid sailor, Granite, a young technician, Narvarth, and their gorgeous, but unscrupulous passenger, Callista. These three survivors had to set aside their differences and join forces to survive that inhospitable place… But now...
metadata.name: Ythaq
